steps.name: User open the Browser and Navigate to URL

elements.name: 1. Verify the website title - Read the title of the website and verify the text

steps.name: Page Opens successfully get the Page title
Compare Title with expected value
Close Browser
User open the Browser and Navigate to URL

elements.name: 2. Verify the website heading - Read the heading of the website and verify the text.

steps.name: Page Opens get Landing Page Heading
Compare Heading with expected value
Close Browser
User open the Browser and Navigate to URL

elements.name: 3. Get the url of the header image - Print the url of the header image to the console

steps.name: Page Opens get url of Header Image
Print url to Console
Close Browser
User open the Browser and Navigate to URL

elements.name: 4. Verify the website’s second heading - Read the second heading of the website and verify the text

steps.name: Page Opens get Landing Page Second Heading
Compare Second Heading with expected value
Close Browser

name: Feature to test basic Job Board Application

steps.name: User open the Browser and Navigate to URL

elements.name: 5. Navigate to another page : Navigate to the “Jobs” page on the site.

steps.name: Page Opens find navigation bar and Click Jobs
Read Page Title and Verify
Close Browser
User open the Browser and Navigate to URL

elements.name: 6. Apply to a job : Search for a job and apply for it.

steps.name: Page Opens find navigation bar and Click Jobs
Click and open the jobs listed.
Click apply button and print the emailId to the console
Close Browser
User open the Browser and Navigate to URL

elements.name: 7. Create a new job listing : Create a new job listing.

steps.name: Page Opens click Post a Job
Fill in the necessary details and click the Preview button.

name: Feature to test Navigation for Job Board Application

elements.name: Login into the website’s backend - Visit the site’s backend and login

steps.name: Admin user open the Browser and Navigate to admin URL
Page Opens enter "root" and "pa$$w0rd" and click login
Verify the user Logged in Successfully
Close Browser

elements.name: Create a job listing using the backend - Visit the site’s backend and create a job listing

steps.name: Admin user open the Browser and Navigate to admin URL
Page Opens enter "root" and "pa$$w0rd" and click login
Verify the user Logged in Successfully
Click Job Listings
Click add New
Fill in the necessary details
Click publish button
Verify the job created
Close Browser
